middleware.name: sensor-xensiv-pasco2
middleware.desc:
Driver for the XENSIV(TM) PAS CO2 sensor.

Note:This is an Early Access Software for PASCO2 devices in ModusToolbox.
This software is made available for evaluation purposes only and is not recommended for production development.

middleware.name: xensiv-radar-sensing
middleware.desc:
Infineon Radar Sensing Middleware for the XENSIV(TM) BGT60TR13C sensor.

Note:This is an Early Access Software for BGT60TR13C devices in ModusToolbox.
This software is made available for evaluation purposes only and is not recommended for production development.
